message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1,000,000. I understand its significance and would like to offer it to you at a special price. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product offers, I propose a price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not only to secure a high-quality item but also to save a considerable amount compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response. Best regards, Alice.
